pageTitle: RED Valentino Flowers & Stripes Sleeveless Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Italian sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 34in / 86.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, Hungary. Dry clean. Lining: 64% acetate/36% modal. Shell: 100% cotton. Fabric: Polished cotton. A smooth bodice slips behind a ruffle-trimmed waist on this RED Valentino dress, which is patterned with playful stripes and flowers. A slender grosgrain ribbon ties in the front, and a hidden zip closes the side. Thin straps. Lined at bodice. Description Mini > Dresses > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer An acronym for Romantic Eccentric Dress, REDValentino lives up to its name. By revisiting the timeless beauty of Valentino, the label has opened the door to a glamorous and playful parallel world where the fairytale princess can explore a darker romanticism. In this world, REDValentino mixes its various influences, from a myriad of places and eras, allowing a girl to experiment to her heart's content and daring her to wear couture with an edge. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all
